resources.string: See show times and in to participate!

If this is an emergency, dial 911 now.
TERMS OF USE AND PRIVACY STATEMENT
If you want to be part of shows simply call in and Call Screener will take your information
Thank you for providing your feedback. If this is an emergency, please call 9-1-1.
We apologize for any inconvenience you are experiencing using our app. Please provide as much detail below so we can troubleshoot your problem. Thank you.
Thank you for providing your feedback.
We want to hear about your experience so we cam improve and serve you and others better. Thanks for taking the time to tell us.
TheHopeLine responded quickly to my need.
TheHopeLine HopeCoach was courteous and professional.
I will refer TheHopeLine to my friends.
My preferred method of contacting TheHopeLine is:
Thanks for listening to Dawson McAllister!
Live On: Sunday Nights 7-8 pm CST
Call during the live show to speak with Dawson
